payFeatures1: PAYLINE WINNINGS IS LINE BET MULTIPLIED BY SYMBOL PAYOUT.
payFeatures2: MALFUNCTION VOIDS ALL PAYS AND PLAYS.

cnfeature1: PAYOUT ARE AWARDED FOR WINNING COMBINATION ON ACTIVE PAYLINES FROM LEFTMOST REEL TO RIGHT
cnfeature2: PAYLINE WINNING = LINE BET x SYMBOL PAYOUT
cnfeature3: ONLY THE HIGHEST WINNING COMBINATION ON EACH PAYLINE IS PAID.
cnfeature4: WINNING SYMBOLS ARE REMOVED AND NEW SYMBOLS FALL DOWN TO FILL THE GAPS.
cnfeature5: 3 or more BONUS symbol on ANY REELS will be awarded with
cnfeature6: During free spins, 3 or more bonus symbol will trigger random number of ADDITIONAL SPINS
cnfeature8: on free spins mode, new set of symbols and paytable activate on free spins
cnfeature10: SCATTER WIN is multiplied by total bet!
